page.title: 03SOMERSET NORTH LEVELS
page.content: THE LEVELS OF THESE NORTHERN PARTS OF SOMERSET ARE DOMINATED BY THE MENDIP HILLS.THESE GIVE TO THE RIVER AXE AND ITS TRIBUTARIES,THUS PROVIDING THE AREA WITH GOOD NATURAL DRAINAGE AND THE FISHERMAN WITH A PLACE TO USE HIS SKILL. THE WATERWAYS IN THE AREA ARE WELL STOCKED WITH FISH BY CLUBS WHICH OWN THE FISHING RIGHTS AND WHICH PROVIDE GOOD SPORT FOR ITS MEMBERS. ALONG THE RIVER BANKS,THE PATIENT,MAJESTIC HERON CAN BE SEEN,QUIETLY COMPETING WITH THE ANGLER FOR ITS LUNCH. THE VALLEY FLOOR WITH ITS GREEN FIELDS,ITS WILLOWS,ITS CATTLE AND ITS SHEEP,ITS ALSO DOTTED WITH ATTRACTIVE FARMSTEADS.THESE ARE WORK PLACES WITH ATTACTIVE GARDENS CAUSING VISITORS TO STOP,TO LOOK AND TO LINGER.
